#About the Author {#author}

![text](./Data/AnhDo_photo.jpg)

Alice Do (Anh Do) is an aspiring data scientist who is also passionate in data visualization and data story telling. She is currently pursuing a Master of Science in Analytics, specializing in Data Science and Marketing Analytics from American University.

Alice developed this Shiny App both as a Final Exam submission for her Data Science class, and a presentation of her research regarding asthma prevalence in the U.S.
